meta.title: KADO — AR solution for construction | Intellectsoft US
meta.description: Use our AR software solution to visualize BIM on-site, improve MEP productivity and your construction process productivity in general. Augmented reality in construction is a better way to fix reworks in AEC, HVAC, MEP. See how you can benefit with KADO.
meta.keywords: AR software, AEC, HVAC, KADO, MEP, BIM, explore, models, model stability, model dimensions, dimensions, AR model viewer, AR, VR, virtual reality, Revit, AutoCAD

explore.title: Use the paired power of our KADO technology and Microsoft HoloLens for precise measurements and point layout in your construction process. KADO gives you the tools to see how MEP communications should be built in real-world conditions before the setup stage. For MEP engineers and BIM specialists.

benefits.title: Decreasing Clashes & Reworks with AR
benefits.text: Each year $15 billion is spent on reworks in construction projects. We are building a technology that helps to avoid reworks, increasing the productivity of a construction process. How? KADO creates on-site model visualization with precise and stable coordinate frames directly linked to the BIM models. Use the power of KADO to drastically increase productivity of the on-site team! Now workers have the tools to see how MEP communications should be built in real world conditions before everything is setup. No more misunderstood blueprints and slow layout of installations with a traditional tape measure!

items.text: 75% faster point layout compared to tape measurement
Lower number of clashes and reworks
No downtimes due to less errors

items.title: Model stability in large spaces
items.subtitle: KADO increases the precision of model stability by using more tracking algorithms.

items.title: Easy measurements between points
items.subtitle: KADO integrates the measurements of model dimensions and points into an AR model viewer.

listItems.text: Virtual and real world points measurements

items.title: Standard Industry Formats Support
items.subtitle: Take your common project file formats on-site with KADO. Our technology supports Revit and AutoCAD file formats.

action.title: See Augmented Reality in Action!
action.subtitle: KADO gives the power of augmented reality to MEP engineers and BIM specialists. Get access to our closed beta to decrease clashes and reworks in your construction process.

items.title: AR Solutions for Construction Are on the Rise — 2017 Industry Report Overview
items.subtitle: What the industry is saying about new technology, and how can the construction process move into the Digital era?

items.title: Digital Twins of Construction Sites with Advanced Analytics and Autonomous Data Collection
items.subtitle: A detailed look at data collection technology and algorithms for digital reconstruction of construction sites.
